articles.description:
Re One of the main use cases for $BOB is to pay someone privately.
Steps:
1. Create zkAccount
2. Deposit $BOB into zkAccount
3. Transfer to any zkAccount privately
4. Withdraw to any address
recipient doesn't even need $MATIC to withdraw
https://twitter.com/zkBob_/status/1669346394237444103?s=20

🤗 Let us know how you like this new feature in our new Discord: http://discord.gg/zkbob 
All feedback is very much appreciated! ❤️ https://twitter.com/zkBob_/status/1668578867089403904 https://t.co/pwHI6nP0qm

articles.description:
🚨 $PIKA AIRDROP 🚨
Pika just announced the final details of the previously announced airdrop.
6.2% of supply ($2.3m usd) claimable on 22nd of June as $esPIKA (unlocking over 1 year).
Eligible:
- Early traders
- Liquidity providers
Check your amount:
 https://www.pikaprotocol.com/#/airdrop https://twitter.com/PikaProtocol/status/1670804928548225032 https://t.co/GqoCOURCRs


Pika Protocol⚡️: Today, we're thrilled to announce Pika’s retroactive airdrop! 🎉 
https://link.medium.com/BUmowzy8KAb
1/🧵 As we reflect on the last two years of Pika's journey, we're incredibly grateful to our users and community contributors who've helped shape Pika into what it is today.
